title: Library — maré hieronimus | Dance Art | The Sacred Body
sitename: Maré Hieronimus | Dance Art | The Sacred Body
cleaned_text: Library A List of Books in my Library for further Reading, Exploration, Investigation Women's Bodies, Women's Wisdom - The Path of Practice: A woman's Book of Ayurvedic Healing, Maya Tiwari - Balance Your Hormones, Balance Your Life, Dr. Claudia Welch - Woman in the Shaman's Body, Reclaiming the Feminine in Religion and Medicine, Barbara Tedlock, PH.D. - Women Who Run with the Wolves, Dr Clarissa Pinkola Estés - Birthing from Within, Pam England - Ancient Map for Modern Birth, Pam England - The Fourth Trimester, Kimberly Ann Johnson - Healing Magic, A Green Witch Guidebook to Conscious Living, Robin Rose Bennet Yoga, Ayurveda, Mantra and Tantra - The Yoga Sutras of Patanjali, translated by Sri Satchidananda - Gita, The Upanishads, translated by Eknath Easwaran - - Ayurvedic Healing: A Comprehensive Guide, Dr. David Frawley - Yoga and Ayurveda, Self-Healing and Self-Realization, Dr. David Frawley - Ayurveda and the Mind, The Healing of Consciousness, Dr. David Frawley - Inner Tantric Yoga, Dr. David Frawley - Tantra Illuminated, Christopher Wallis - Prakriti, Dr. Robert Svoboda - The Yoga Tradition, George Feuerstein - The Breathing Book, Donna Farhi - Science of Breath, Swami Rama - Chanting: Discovering Spirit in Sound, Robert Gass with Kathleen Brehony - The Path of Practice: A woman's Book of Ayurvedic Healing, Maya Tiwari - The Complete Book of Ayurvedic Home Remedies, Dr. Vasant Lad - The Yoga of Herbs, Dr. David Frawley and Dr. Vasant Lad Somatic Practice and Embodiment Investigation - Making Connections, Peggy Hackney - Body Movement, Coping with the Environment, Irmgard Bartenieff with Dori Lewis - Taking Root To Fly, Irene Dowd - Awareness Through Movement, Moshe Feldenkrais - Body Learning, An Introduction to Alexander Technique, Michael J. Gelb - Sensing, Feeling and Action, Bonnie Bainbridge Cohen - Wisdom of the Body Moving, Linda Hartley - Molecules of Emotion, Candace B. Pert - Bone, Breath & Gesture: Practices of Embodiment, Edited by Don Johnson - Bodystories: A Guide to Experiential Anatomy, Andrea Olson with Caryn McHose - Body and Earth: An Experiential Guide, Andrea Olson Archetypes, Mythology, Dreams and Shamanism - Archetypes and the Collective Unconscious, C.G. Jung - The Hero with a Thousand Faces, Joseph Campbell - The Power of Myth, Joseph Campbell - Dreaming the Soul Back Home, Robert Moss - Traveling Between the Wolds, Conversations with Contemporary Shamans, Hilary Webb - Walkers Between the Worlds, The Western Mysteries from Shaman to Magus, Caitlin and John Matthews - Awakening to the Spirit World, Sandra Ingerman & Hank Wesselman - Soul Retrieval, Mending the Fragmented Self, Sandra Ingerman - Woman in the Shaman's Body, Reclaiming the Feminine in Religion and Medicine, Barbara Tedlock, PH.D. - Shapeshifting into Higher Consciousness, Llyn Roberts Dance, Improvisation, and Performance Theory - Composing While Dancing: An Improviser's Companion, Melinda Buckwalter - A Choreographic Mind: Autobiographical Writings, Susan Rethorst - My Body, The Buddhist, Deborah Hay - Sharing the Dance, Cynthia Novack - Moving Toward Life, Anna Halprin - Meredith Monk, edited by Deborah Jowitt The Subtle Body and Energy Healing - Awakening Healing Energy Through the Tao, Mantak Chia - The Secret Teachings of the Tao Te Ching, Mantak Chia and Tao Huang - Healing with Form, Energy and Light, Tenzin Wangyal Rinpoche - Hands of Light, Barbara Ann Brennan - The Subtle Body, Cyndi Dale - Energy Medicine for Women, Donna Eden Perennial Wisdom and Anthroposophy - The Dhammapada, translated by Eknath Easwaran - Tao Te Ching, Lao Tsu - Theosophy, Rudolf Steiner - Art in the Light of The Mystery Wisdom, Rudolf Steiner - Cosmic Memory, Rudolf Steiner - Intuitive Thinking as a Spiritual Path, Rudolf Steiner - How to Know the Higher
